testcase.name: Viewing Details
testcase.system-out: Given I am on shop module...................................................passed When I select the Peel & Sticker Wallpapers category........................passed And I sort the stickers by price from low to high...........................passed Then it display stickers from low to high...................................passed

testcase.name: Filtering by price
testcase.system-out: Given I am on shop module...................................................passed When I select Wall Stickers category........................................passed And I select price option...................................................passed Then it displays price filter option........................................passed

testcase.name: Filtering by colours
testcase.system-out: Given I am on shop module...................................................passed When I select WallPapers category...........................................passed And I select colour.........................................................passed Then it display stickers based on the colour................................passed

testcase.name: Getting latest trending news - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on shop module...................................................passed When I enter email as "hima@gmail.com"......................................passed And I click on subscribe button.............................................passed Then I subscribed successfully..............................................passed
